description: A vegan tomato based chilli with plenty of spice.
keywords: Chilli,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Sweet potato,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Sweet Potato Chilli Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g sweet potato, peeled and chopped into small bites
1 medium red onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a large pot with the canola oil and fry the onion for 2 minutes. Add the chopped sweet potato to the pot and fry for a further 4 minutes while tossing. Add the rest of the ingredients to the pot and mix well.
Bring the heat down to a simmer and allow the entire dish to cook for 20 minutes while stirring occasionally.
Serve with a choice of condiments or sides and season to taste if required.
